question: What is the Main aim of Powertex India?
option1: To supply power to Industries at free of cost
option2: To provide incentives to power supply companies
option3: To empower the self-help groups in textiles
option4: To provide Financial assistance to economically weaker low end power loom units.
answer: To provide Financial assistance to economically weaker low end power loom units.
explanation: Ministry of textiles launched the Powertex India scheme to provide financial assistance to economically weaker low end power loom units as power looms are predominant segment in the entire textile value chain.
